Hello everyone,
          Yesterday i was play on the jailbreak server and the prisoners were rioting and i didn't really want to deal with the riot so basically I i killed myself by pressing the binded button i set to kill and my weapons dropped and i got blacklisted. I didn't mean to drop the weapons all i was meaning to do was kill my self to i didn't have to deal with the riot, it was a misunderstanding and I promise you i will never do it again!
